name: Game Prototype - Welcome to the Space Hotel!
name_original: Game Prototype - Welcome to the Space Hotel!
description:
Game Prototype - Welcome to the Space Hotel! is a platformer game developed by Guillermo Francisco Dezcallar Mangas. It came out on 09-05-2019.
Game Prototype - Welcome to the Space Hotel! is available on PC and Linux. The game is sold via itch.io.
